title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.296 - Responsibility accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.296 - Responsibility accounting

State Regulations

An accounting system which accumulates and communicates
historical and projected monetary and statistical data relating to revenues and
controllable expenses, classified according to organizational units producing
the revenues and responsible for incurring the expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.296

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
